constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 8 (Wednesday, January 12, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GAETZ:
H.R. 6382.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 17 of the U.S. Constitution.
[Page H78]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: To nullify the order of the Mayor of the District of Columbia imposing a vaccine entry requirement for certain establishments and facilities, and for other purposes.
